channel.title: Need help commands really easy!

item.title: Need help commands really easy!
item.dc:creator: @Simon2 Simon^
item.description:
@Simon2 wrote:

Remove your playerName.equalsIgnoreCase line, You won’t need it, If you ever do the command you’ll only get kicked and if you ever set it to ban then you can easily unban yourself in the data files or the character files.

Read full topic
